blogs.title: Debugging in Coding
blogs.body: The act of programming can be an enjoyable pursuit, however, the arduous process of debugging can often consume an extensive amount of time, even stretching over multiple days, in order to successfully identify and rectify the underlying issue. Various sophisticated technologies utilized in this endeavor include Next.js, Sanity io, FramerMotion, and HeroIcons, among others
blogs.author: mario
